front.title: PKCS #5 Password Based Key Derivation Function 2 (PBKDF2) Test Vectors

abstract.t: This document contains test vectors for the Public-Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS) #5 Password Based Key Derivation Function 2 (PBKDF2) with the Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA-1) pseudorandom function.
